name: Into The Slime [LD43]
description:
This project is our first attpempt to do a grid-based game. In 2 days we managed to do a generataion system to create different levels in a 10x10 area. We made a couple of different mechanics and a few levels. The objective was to make a prototype that could be expanded in almost infinites directions.

Engine

Godot 3.0.6
